pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-navx============This is a python implementation of the kauailabs NavX library... note:: The RobotPy project is not associated with or endorsed by kauailabsDocumentation=============* `Installation <http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install/navx.html>`_* `Python API Documentation <http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/projects/navx/en/stable/api.html>`_* `Examples <https://github.com/robotpy/robotpy-navx/tree/main/examples>`_License=======The original NavX software is available under the MIT license, as is this.
